meaningMnemonic: A <kanji>stubborn</kanji> <kanji>height</kanji> is a shorter, stockier height. It makes a person especially <vocabulary>solid</vocabulary>, <vocabulary>firm</vocabulary>, and <vocabulary>stout</vocabulary>.
readingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word that uses the on'yomi readings of the kanji. You should be able to read this on your own.
